ygData.subject: Re: Question for Elder bards
ygData.msgSnippet: Hail Fellow Bards, I charmed an IG Magi sometime back, I don t recall my level, think it was 50 and couldn t have been over 51 since I m still there, hehe. It
ygData.messageBody:
Hail Fellow Bards,

I charmed an IG Magi sometime back, I don't recall my level, think it was
50 and couldn't have been over 51 since I'm still there, hehe. It was nifty
to have him beat on Vox a bit in between trying to pound me into the ground.
I was in melee range most of the time of him and Vox, due to the press of
players and corpses. Vox got pulled into the hallway by accident and the IG
showed up halfway thru the battle. I recharmed him repeatedly, didn't have
anything special in the way of charisma either, and didn't get many resists.
Probably was just the way my luck was that night though. I managed to live
thru the whole fight even though the group tanks were among the first to go
down. It was a messy run, partly due to being a second or maybe third
attempt with staggered IG respawns and whatnot. We triumphed in the end, and
nothing good at all dropped.

/em hobbles back over to her rocker. ;)

Granny Brilinnia Ban'Sidhe, Xegony
